entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:43 a.m. EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -8.8Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 late this morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the morning then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
